text: Ordered Remy Briyani for 150 pax. Evryone loves the food, 1 serving is nt enough that is how good it is. I would recomend this Briyani to be enjoyed with ur love ones on any occasion. Supperb delicious 5/5 ⭐️

This last February marked the second time I entrusted Remy, Christine, and their team with catering for my children’s wedding. As a returning client, it speaks volumes about the exceptional quality of both their food and service. Once again, they delivered beyond expectations. The coordination was seamless, and everything ran smoothly, making the occasion truly memorable.

Thank you, Remy, Christine, and the entire team, for your outstanding work and dedication.

This maintains a warm tone while expressing gratitude and praise for their service.

I am very pleased with Remy's service.  Very talented MUA and his catering is delicious. People feedback that the food catering is superb.  Thank you again for being my MUA on my special day.  And supplying delicious food.  Definitely recommended to to those bride to be.  You won't be disappointed.  Fuss and stress free.

P/S: even my daughter make up and hair done by Remy.  She love it! Friendly and reliable too.

Definitely one of the BEST BRIYANI our family and myself had tried so far!! REMY MOHAMED HAS OUTDONE HIMSELF ANOTHER TIME!!! From his excellent bridal services and now BRIYANI!! His food is definitely a must to TRY!!! ❤️❤️
The services are extremely excellent. The spread of foods they have are super super delicious fresh and tasty. Highly recommended as they cater for all occasions 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟👍👍👍👍👍
